text: Love Station is a 2019 Nepalese drama romance film directed by Ujwal Ghimire. The film is produced by Gobinda Shahi, Krishu Shahi, and Kabir Bikram Shahi under the banner of Kafiya Films. The film stars Pradeep Khadka, and Jassita Gurung in the lead roles alongside Ramesh Budhathoki, Siru Bista, Rabi Dangol and Priya Rizal in the supporting roles. The film is scheduled to release on 5 April 2019. == Plot == Here a Nepalese boy love a girl and they break up and get together at the end of the movie == Cast == * Pradeep Khadka * Jassita Gurung * Ramesh Budhathoki * Siru Bista * Rabi Dangol * Priya Rizal == References == == External links == * Category:Nepali-language films Category:Nepalese films Category:2019 films
title: Love Station (2019 film)
